text: In government, unicameralism is when there is only one legislative or parliamentary chamber. Therefore, a unicameral legislature or unicameral parliament is a legislature with one chamber. It comes from the Latin "uni" (meaning one) and "camera" (meaning chamber). Unicameral legislatures are used around the world. Since 1937, the US State of Nebraskaâ€™s Nebraska Legislature has been unicameral, however all other US states use a bicameral system. == Related pages == * Bicameral Category:Unicameral legislatures
title: Unicameralism
